mapper.insert: INSERT into student (number, class_id, name, math, english, java, os, sports) values (#{number},#{class_id},#{name},#{math},#{english},#{java},#{os},#{sports});
mapper.update: Update student SET number = #{number}, class_id = #{class_id}, name = #{name}, math = #{math}, english = #{english}, java = #{java}, os = #{os}, sports = #{sports}, WHERE student_id = #{studentID};
